valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 1006 expected England 999 by 1800 Saturday. Low Hebrides 998 expected Norwegian Basin 995 by same time. New low expected Shannon 1011

Wind
Southwesterly becoming cyclonic, then northwesterly later, 4 to 6, occasionally 7.
Sea state
Slight or moderate at first in the utsires, otherwise moderate or rough.
Weather
Occasional rain or showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
